name: George Orwell
biography: Author of 1984 and Animal Farm, known for his political satire.

name: Jane Austen
biography: English novelist best known for Pride and Prejudice and Sense and Sensibility.

name: Gabriel García Márquez
biography: Nobel Prize-winning author of One Hundred Years of Solitude.

name: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
biography: Author of Americanah and Half of a Yellow Sun, known for her modern feminist themes.

name: Haruki Murakami
biography: Japanese novelist known for surrealist works like Kafka on the Shore and 1Q84.
